short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get udemy course initial publish date.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you find it frustrating to visit a Udemy course page, only to discover that the "last updated" date is recent, but the course content is outdated? 

To help solve this issue, you can install a browser extension that adds a banner to the top of the course page, displaying the original date that the course was published. 

This will provide you with more accurate information about the course's age and help you make informed decisions about whether it meets your needs.

Note that instructors sometimes update their courses and mention it in the course description. So please read the description and watch intro video provided by the instructor to get a better idea.
